text: Publius Quinctilius Varus (46 BC in Cremona, Roman Republic - AD 9 in Germania) was a Roman politician and general under Emperor Augustus. He is mainly remembered for having lost three Roman legions and his own life when attacked by Germanic leader Arminius in the Battle of the Teutoburg Forest. Category:46 BC births Category:9 deaths Category:Roman generals Category:People from Cremona
title: Publius Quinctilius Varus
